summary: Mangosteen is a tropical fruit native to Southeast Asia, growing on evergreen trees. It has a purple rind and sweet, tangy flesh with a texture like citrus fruits. The tree can grow up to 82 feet tall and is now cultivated in various tropical regions worldwide. The fruit is the most well-known from the Garcinia genus, which also includes lesser-known fruits like the button mangosteen and charichuelo.
title: Mangosteen
